changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX "COMPONENT_DIRECT_DEPENDENCIES_JSONB_IDX" ON "COMPONENT" USING GIN("DIRECT_DEPENDENCIES" JSONB_PATH_OPS);

changeSet.sql: UPDATE "PROJECT" SET "INACTIVE_SINCE" = NOW() WHERE "ACTIVE" IS FALSE
